Falun gong founder li hongzhi claimed that Donald trump is protected by God and would go on and win the election, Epoch times, during the election campaign, attacked Joe Biden and kept publishing lies against him. At the end, Donald didn't win, now epoch times siding with Joe. Who won? Epoch time, who lost? The American people, were divided by this publishing machine epoch times. Kick them back to China.

comments_since_last_sample.body: You should have pointed out that they don't kill you before the organ is taken, and also without putting the doner to sleep without any pain medication. Yes held down and cut open.
So.... High-Speed Rail that goes nowhere was instituted in China to facilitate organ harvesting?
2035年7月15日中國入侵菲律賓，中國向呂宋派兵200萬。 中國領土擴大，包括棉蘭老島。 菲律賓總統逃入美國 50萬菲律賓軍隊向中國軍隊投降
